verses.roman:
prabhure lañā gelā sabe samudrera tīre
snāna karāñā punaḥ tāṅre lañā āilā ghare

synonyms: prabhure—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; lañā—taking; gelā—went; sabe—all; samudrera tīre—to the beach by the sea; snāna karāñā—bathing Him; punaḥ—again; tāṅre—Him; lañā āilā—brought back; ghare—to His residence.
translation: Then all the devotees took Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu to the beach and bathed Him. Finally they brought Him back home.
